attributes.action: Grant John Sentamu the peerage he deserves
attributes.additional_details: Not granting John Sentamu a peerage would be unfair as a peerage is usually handed out automatically to retiring Archbishops of York. As Archbishop he used his ministry to strive tirelessly towards trying to make UK society fairer and more just for people of all backgrounds. He had the courage to challenge and speak out critically against the UK’s political and economic ruling elites on important moral issues. Importantly, BAME people are under represented in the House of Lords.
attributes.background: Urge the Prime-minister and honours committee to grant John Sentamu the peerage that has historically been granted to retiring Archbishops of York.
